https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9LZgpUyFEvqHaDVuveE002mhgTi.jpg Rahul embarks on a journey to a small town in Tamil Nadu to fulfill the last wish of his grandfather: to have his ashes immersed in the Holy water of Rameshwaram. En route, he meets a woman hailing from a unique family down South. As they find love through this journey in the exuberant lands of South India, an unanticipated drive awaits them. Chennai Express
